text: *Bike bell x2*
- Prof. Oak: Oh! You're back!
Have you discovered all 150 Pokémon yet?
- Red: Yeah. Uh, instead of trying to find every species of Pokémon by myself, I went on the internet and looked it up.
Turns out there's over 850. I mean, that's not even including Mega, and there's Alola, there's Gigantamax forms.
I mean, of course, you know this already, but yeah, you are welcome, I guess.
- Prof. Oak: 850?
Forms?!
I had no idea!
My life is a waste!
*crying Prof. Oak intensifies*
- Scyther: Pssst. There's this one site, Bulbapedia, it's got like, everything.
- Red: Surrender, MissingNo.!
I have so many Pokéballs. I...will not stop.
*Pokémon caught music*
- Red: Scyther, my friend.
By capturing this aberration, I now have 128 bikes.
And if each bike is worth $1,000,000 dollars...
-Scyther: Wow! You got a $128,000,000 dollars?!
- Red: Haha. No.
WE have a $126,000,000 dollars.
- Scyther You'd... share it with... me?
- Red: I equipped you with EXP. Share for a reason.
- Scyther: But wait, boss. From all the math lessons you've been giving me,
...126,000,000 means we'll have two bikes left over.
Why would you -
Weeeeeeeeeehehehe!!! Yeah!!!
Scyther!
- Prof. Oak : *holding back tears* Now's not the time to use that!
- Red: I got your tenure revoked. You are professor of nothing.
- Scyther: *Oak crying in the background* Yeah! Be quiet, disembodied voice!
- Mom: Honey! You look... different.
- Ditto: Yep. Nope, this is me. It's Red, your normal kid.
Normal kid! Haha!
Normal!
- Mom: Oh, good! I was worried for a moment!
Keep playing in your shell while I go make us some lunch.
Hey folks!
If you enjoyed that episode, by far the best way to support dorkly is to sign up for drop out.
Every month for less than the price of a predatory loot box in a video game, you get dorkly shows a week early, you get
access to the drop out discord where you can talk to us about those predatory loot boxes and
you get exclusive shows like d20 and troopers which are both so funny if there were people, I would kiss them
But I can't because they're shows, so go to drop out TV. Check it out
You will not feel shame about it, like you do about those loot boxes. That's my promise.
